charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-On or about 4/19/94 Dft did knowingly possess more than 5 grams of a mixture or substance continaing cocaine base (crack), with intent to distribute (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft committed to the custody of the BOP for 168 months; upon release dft placed on Supvd Release for 5 yrs; no fine; Special Assmt of $50 due within 60 days of 12/23/94 (See J&;C) (1)

charges.charge_description: On or about 4/19/94 Dft did possess more than 5 grams of cocaine base (crack) with intent to distribute same in violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1) [1:94-m-6017]
